div.p: Dedicated IT professional with 15+ years facilitating and supporting human interactions with complex systems and software. Maintains user-centric designs while adhering to prescribed interface principals and related development goals. Dedicated to creating, inviting and unintimidating interfaces for everything from simple open-source applications to complex proprietary systems.
Please review my resume (linked below) for more details on the listed qualifications on the right:

p.em: Innovative and deadline-driven Front End Developer and aspiring fullstack developer with 15+ years of experience in designing and developing user-centered applications from initial design to final, well-crafted deliverable.
Dr GRD College of Science affiliated to Bhartiyar University, Coimbatore, India
CSI Higher Secondary School, Coimbatore, India
St. Michael's Higher Secondary School, Coimbatore, India

ul.li: Developing and maintaining responsive, user-friendly ecommerce website using technologies such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React, NextJS.
Implementing optimized and performant frontend solutions that improve page load times and enhance the user experience.
Collaborating with cross-functional teams of designers, developers, and product owners to deliver high-quality products on tight deadlines.
Worked closely with customers, team and other stakeholders to determine planning, implementation and integration of system-oriented projects.
Delivered technical expertise for research, analysis and problem resolution for enterprise-wide solutions
Identified issues in software processes and implemented optimization techniques, resulting in 10% increase in productivity.
Framework & toolkit selection or development matched to business & technical requirements.
Engineered prototypes to support research and usability testing and ensuring technical feasibility of UI/UX designs.
Organized and monitored technical activity for 4 projects in 2016-18 and complied with set of customer driven objectives
Dynamic generation of charts, tree widgets and Dashboard based on REST API Result.
Identified opportunities for improvements that upon execution, resulted in 30% decrease in support calls

div.h2:
Got a project in mind?
Drop me a line!
Let's make something awesome together.
